value.string: Task description: This task retrieve parameters from the input config file during run time.
Assign a Config Missiging variable, this variable will be passed on to the main process - and the process will stop if there are any variables missing
HARDCODED VARIABLES - CHANGE BEFORE PROD MIGRATION
PI Creation from Backstop - Error: Missing Variable in Config File

value.expression:
Hello, 

Technical Error: Bot unable to read variables

The PI Creation from Backstop bot was not completed successfully as there was a missing variable in the config file.
Please contact the RPA support group - RPASupport@sbafla.com for resolutions.

Date and time: @$m-date-string$
Username: $m-string-1$

value.string: An issue occured while reading the input variables in the Config file.
Raise exception via email and set vErrorFlag to 1 which will be passed on to main task to stop the process and close applications.
Backstop PI - Tech Error: Bot unable to access Bot input config file

value.expression:
Hello, 

Technical Error: Bot unable to access Bot input config file

The Backstop PI bot was not completed successfully as the required input config file.
Please contact the RPA support group - RPASupport@sbafla.com for resolutions.

File Path: $@AAApplicationPath$\Automation Anywhere\My Docs\SBA\Accounting\SBARPA002 - PI Creation from Backstop\SBARPA002-Backstop_PI_InputConfig File.csv

Date and time: $m-date-string$
Username: $m-string-1$

value.string: Assign a Config Missiging variable, this variable will be passed on to the main process - and the process will stop if there are any variables missing
Read Variables from the input config file, these variables will be assigned appropriately and be used throughout the process
If there is nothing in csv exit the loop
If the cell value is empty exist the loop

The following if, and elseif statements checks the csv file to determine which column in the csv file the bot should use for processing. There are 3 columns in the csv file, 2 = Dev, 3 = Prod , 4 = RevoryCR
Check if there is a valid column value assigned from the previous CR identification loop.
Raise exception via email and set vErrorConfigDefect to 2 which will be passed on to main task to stop the process and close applications.
Backstop PI - Tech Error: Bot unable to identify Prod/Non Prod env

value.expression:
Hello, 

Technical Error: Bot unable to identify Prod/Non Prod env

The Backstop PI bot was not completed successfully as the AA CR URL did not match with the configured values.

Please contact the RPA support group - RPASupport@sbafla.com for resolutions.
